alert.note: Alert for Jackson County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 13 at 10:02PM PST until January 14 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 4 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...South winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...The southern end of the Rogue Valley and surrounding foothills. This includes Ashland, Talent, Phoenix, and south Medford. This also includes portions of Interstate 5 and Highway 140 in the Cascade foothills. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 4 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
